spatial_accuracy.notes: Excellent layout preservation. However, the door to Bedroom 1 is swinging into the hallway instead of into the room. The wash area and toilet partition walls are slightly thicker than specified in the 2D plan.

structural_fidelity.notes: All rooms are accounted for, roof is removed, and there are no text labels or UI elements. The model correctly floats on a neutral background.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture placement is highly accurate (sofa, dining set, bed, kitchen counters). A minor scale discrepancy exists in the bathroom fixtures which appear slightly oversized.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Follows the low-poly style with flat shading well. The shadows in the corners are slightly more dramatic than a strict 'flat' shading requirement, but they aid in depth perception.

detected_errors.description: Bedroom 1 door leaf orientation is reversed compared to the floor plan.
Minor scaling distortion in bathroom fixtures.
